column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata is located where Hue used to be
column2: and besides the cuisine shift from Vietnamese to Japanese
column3: it doesn't look like much else has changed. The ambiance is similar
column5: and the staff is still friendly and all smiles. The menu
column6: while not quite as ambitious as Uchi
column7: had quite a few dishes that caught my eye. Unfortunately
column9: and my wallet is price-conscious. I considered waiting until I actually had a proper meal here
column10: but who knows when that will be. So this review will be for their HAPPY HOUR ONLY.
